mapper.select: select a.ID as Aid, b.name as sex, a.A0107 as birthDay, c.name as nation, a.A0134 as workingTime, d.name as personType, a.A0184 as idCard, a.A0101 as name, a.A0111A as homeTown, a.A0114A as birthPlace, a.A0128 as healthState, e.name as manageType, a.A0187A as speciality, a.A1701 as resume, a.A0192A as jobNameL, a.A0192 as jobNameS, a.A15Z101 as yearResult, a.A0196 as specialityPost, a.A0192c as gradeTime, a.A14Z101 as awardAndPenalty, (SELECT q.name FROM dic_rs_zb09 q WHERE a.A0172=q.code) as jobLevel, (SELECT w.name FROM dic_rs_njszj w WHERE a.A0192d=w.code) as grade, a.ZZXLXX as graduateSchool1, a.QRZXLXX as graduateSchool2, a.A0173 as jobLevelTime, a.A99Z101 as examination, a.A99Z102 as employTime, a.A99Z103 as transferring, a.A99Z104 as transferringTime, a.A0115A as grow_old, a.A0120 as level, a.AGE as remarks from rs_a01 a, dic_rs_ax b , dic_rs_ae c, dic_rs_zb125 d, dic_rs_zb130 e where a.ID=#{ID} AND a.A0104=b.code AND a.A0117=c.code AND a.A0160=d.code AND a.A0165=e.code
select picpath as imgUrl from rs_a01_userpic where SID =#{Aid}

select a.ID as Aid, b.name as sex, a.A0107 as birthDay, c.name as nation, a.A0134 as workingTime, d.name as personType, a.A0184 as idCard, a.A0101 as name, a.A0111A as homeTown, a.A0114A as birthPlace, a.A0128 as healthState, e.name as manageType, a.A0187A as speciality, a.A1701 as resume, a.A0192A as jobNameL, a.A0192 as jobNameS, a.A15Z101 as yearResult, a.A0196 as specialityPost, a.A0192c as gradeTime, a.A14Z101 as awardAndPenalty, (SELECT q.name FROM dic_rs_zb09 q WHERE a.A0172=q.code) as jobLevel, (SELECT w.name FROM dic_rs_njszj w WHERE a.A0192d=w.code) as grade, a.ZZXLXX as graduateSchool1, a.QRZXLXX as graduateSchool2, a.A0173 as jobLevelTime from rs_a01 a, dic_rs_ax b , dic_rs_ae c, dic_rs_zb125 d, dic_rs_zb130 e where ID=#{id} AND a.A0104=b.code AND a.A0117=c.code AND a.A0160=d.code AND a.A0165=e.code

select a.ID as Aid, b.name as sex, a.A0107 as birthDay, c.name as nation, a.A0134 as workingTime, d.name as personType, a.A0184 as idCard, a.A0101 as name, a.A0111A as homeTown, a.A0114A as birthPlace, a.A0128 as healthState, e.name as manageType, a.A0187A as speciality, a.A1701 as resume, a.A0192A as jobNameL, a.A0192 as jobNameS, a.A15Z101 as yearResult, a.A0196 as specialityPost, a.A0192c as gradeTime, a.A14Z101 as awardAndPenalty, (SELECT q.name FROM dic_rs_zb09 q WHERE a.A0172=q.code) as jobLevel, (SELECT w.name FROM dic_rs_njszj w WHERE a.A0192d=w.code) as grade, a.ZZXLXX as graduateSchool1, a.QRZXLXX as graduateSchool2, a.A0173 as jobLevelTime from rs_a01 a, dic_rs_ax b , dic_rs_ae c, dic_rs_zb125 d, dic_rs_zb130 e where ID=#{id} AND a.A0104=b.code AND a.A0117=c.code AND a.A0160=d.code AND a.A0165=e.code

select a.ID as Aid, a.A0184 as idCard, a.A0101 as name, a.A0192A as jobNameL, a.A0192c as gradeTime, (SELECT q.name FROM dic_rs_zb09 q WHERE a.A0172=q.code) as jobLevel, (SELECT w.name FROM dic_rs_njszj w WHERE a.A0192d=w.code) as grade, a.A0173 as jobLevelTime from rs_a01 a where a.id=#{Aid}

select a.ID as Aid, a.A0184 as idCard, a.A0101 as name, a.A0192A as jobNameL, a.A0192c as gradeTime, (SELECT q.name FROM dic_rs_zb09 q WHERE a.A0172=q.code) as jobLevel, (SELECT w.name FROM dic_rs_njszj w WHERE a.A0192d=w.code) as grade, a.A0173 as jobLevelTime from rs_a01 a where 1=1

SELECT a.id AS Aid FROM rs_a01 a WHERE 1=1
AND a.A0104=#{sexValue}
AND #{age_highest}>=a.A0107
AND a.A0107>=#{age_lowest}
AND a.A0117=(SELECT CODE FROM dic_rs_ae WHERE NAME=#{nationValue} )
AND a.A0111A=#{place}
AND a.A0192d=(select code from dic_rs_njszj where name=#{CurrentLevel})
AND a.A0172=(select code from dic_rs_zb09 where name=#{Joblevel} )
AND a.A0160=(select code from dic_rs_zb125 where name=#{personnel} )
AND a.A0165=(select code from dic_rs_zb130 where name=#{manage})
AND a.A0121=(select code from dic_rs_zb135 where name=#{Compile})
AND a.A0173=#{NewJoblevel}
AND a.A99Z102 like concat('%', #{employTime} ,'%')
AND a.id=(select SID from rs_a39 where A0144 like concat('%', #{joinTime},'%') )
AND a.A99Z103=#{transferring}
AND a.A14Z101 like concat('%', #{rewardPunishment},'%')
AND a.A15Z101 like concat('%', #{yearResult},'%')
select SID as Aid from rs_a08 where SID=#{Aid} AND A0837=1 AND A0801A like concat('%', #{sex},'%')
select SID as Aid from rs_a08 where SID=#{Aid} AND A0837=2 AND A0801A like concat('%', #{sex},'%')
select SID as Aid from rs_a02 where SID=#{Aid} AND A0201A = #{sex} AND A0265 is null
select SID as Aid from rs_a02 where SID=#{Aid} AND A0215A like concat('%', #{sex},'%')
select SID as Aid from rs_a39 where SID=#{Aid} AND A0144 like concat('%', #{sex},'%')

select AGE as birthDay from rs_a01
#{item}

select id as Aid, A0173 as birthDay from rs_a01
#{item}
SELECT ID as Aid FROM rs_a01 WHERE A0172=#{jobLevel}
SELECT ID as Aid FROM rs_a01 WHERE A0172 is null
SELECT id as Aid,A0104 as sex FROM rs_a01 WHERE id=#{ID}
select SID as Aid from rs_a02 where LEFT(A0201B,7)=#{userID} group by SID
select SID as Aid from rs_a02 where LEFT(A0201B,7)=#{userID} group by SID
select SID as Aid from rs_a02 where A0201B=#{UID} AND A0281="Y"
